comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be www.boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=57745&cat=boxer lightweight boxer, Harry Donahue, whose first name was actually Henry and who came from Pekin, Illinois. According to NYT, he boxed in New York in the Spring of 1913. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00E2D9103CE633A...
